price: (12) And we have become certain that we will never cause failure to Allāh upon earth, nor can we escape Him by flight.
arabic: وَأَنَّا ظَنَنَّآ أَن لَّن نُّعۡجِزَ ٱللَّهَ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ وَلَن نُّعۡجِزَهُۥ هَرَبٗا

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: wa-annā ẓanannā an lan nuʿ'jiza al-laha fī al-arḍi walan nuʿ'jizahu haraban
